Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lgPfjtGDLg

Shows a heavy rolling motion when under the Mach. (1:10~1:50)

It is actually similar?

Nice replica! If anything, I would say your Starfighter has a little bit too much wing. The F-104's wing was stupidly small.

And yes, with most of the weight concentrated in the fuselage, and a tiny, anhedral wing, a little roll instability is to be expected...
